channel.title: Port fowarding
channel.description:
hello. i have a netgear router. today i was going to try port fowarding for the first time. i loged in to the net gear. i clicked on the port forwarding. Then i had no idea what to do. I am asking for clear instructions to port forwarding for scratch. i want to also use no-ip. i have no idea to do anything
I WANT INSTRUCTIONS NOT TuT! IF I GET A TuT IT IS REPORTED AS SPAM THANKS![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2008, 10:13:28 PM[/size][hr]what i mean by no TuT is, i dont want a link i want the instructions here
